definition: to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)

sentences.english: Do not give patient any baking soda or emetics.
sentences.chinese: 禁止给病人碳酸氢钠或催吐剂。

sentences.english: He was given emetic ( medicine ) after eating poisonous berries.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了有毒的浆果，已给了他催吐剂。

sentences.english: The roots are used as an emetic.
If oral intake of this product should be timely to induce vomiting, severe cases should be immediately to the hospital for medical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 如误服本品应及时催吐，严重者应立即到医院就医。

sentences.english: Crystallization process of reserpine was investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究从催吐萝芙木中提取利血平的结晶工艺。

sentences.english: But in general have a more scientific method emetic .
sentences.chinese: 但一般还得采用更为科学的催吐剂法。

definition: to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)
to save food/to go on a diet
